text: Jo manusya mana-sanmana prapta karu icchita asela, tara (tyane januna ghyave ki) samasta mana-pratistha allahakaritaca ahe. Samasta pavitra vacane tyacyacakade cadhatata ani satkarma tyanna uncavite, ani je loka duskarmancya kata karasthanata vyasta rahatata, tyancyasathi motha sakta azaba ahe ani tyance he pakhanda nasa pavela
